name: Salasa Holding Ltd.
description: Operator of an e-commerce fulfillment company intended to help merchants scale up their business. The company offers ways, tools, and resources including handling and storing products, order processing, fast shipping, and return management, enabling e-commerce businesses to provide their customers with a seamless online shopping experience that helps them to generate sales and develop their brand.

The company offers ways, tools, and resources including handling and storing products, order processing, fast shipping, and return management, enabling e-commerce businesses to provide their customers with a seamless online shopping experience that helps them to generate sales and develop their brand.
